title: Enhancing Packet Trackers
short_description: Hey there! This article covers all the cool stuff we've been up to this summer for the GSoC project related to packet trackers.

content.1_para: We have introduced a new RPacketLastInteractionTracker class to keep track of the last interaction of a RPacket.
content.3_para: As a result of the tracker restructuring, the peak memory usage has been reduced from 4 GB to approximately 1 GB.
content.8_para: Also, we made sure to create lots of tests and benchmarks to ensure that the trackers are working at their best.
content.9_para: The detailed report for the GSoC project is available here.
